1: I sing wholehearted praise openly wherever I am.
2: I praise steadfast love and truth, honoring the trustworthy word above all.
3: Heartfelt call brings inner strength and ready support.
4: All leaders praise upon hearing wise words
5: People sing while following good paths, celebrating great glory.
6: True greatness honors humility with closeness and care.
7: Steadfast care revives, strengthens, and saves.
8: Enduring mercy perfects every good purpose and work.
